issue.title: [CI][C++][Gandiva] MacOS builds are failing because of the version of the LLVM
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The actual version of the LLVM library inside the macOS builds is 12, but the Gandiva only supports the versions between 6 to 12.
